description_long: Bitwarden is a free and open-source password management service that stores sensitive information such as website credentials in an encrypted vault.

This is a Bitwarden server API implementation written in Rust compatible with upstream Bitwarden clients, perfect for self-hosted deployment where running the official resource-heavy service might not be ideal.
hint: At first use, you will have to create an account. This is not for security (Portal itself provides that) but because of insufficient integration.
Multi-user features are not functional yet, only you can use the app.
